document_data.mainbody:
Teth was an independent city located just south of the country of Aglarond during the midâ€“14 century DR. 
The city lay on the coast of the Wizards Reach on the Sea of Fallen Stars just south of the Yuirwood.
Teth was initially founded by the empire of Unther following the great wars between Narfell and Raumathar, but over the passage of time Unther lacked the strength to hold it and Teth eventually declared independence in the .
